title: Microsoft
subTitle: Managing identity, database, and security within Microsoft ecosystem
overviewContent: Experience across the Microsoft ecosystem, including Azure SQL Database, Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD), and Microsoft 365 services. Responsibilities include configuring and managing secure access to corporate systems, implementing Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), and applying conditional access policies to strengthen identity security. Proficient in monitoring and interpreting audit and sign-in logs to detect and respond to potential security risks. Additionally, managed security configurations for Microsoft-based mail servers, ensuring data protection and compliance with organisational policies. Hands-on work with Azure SQL Database has also supported scalable, cloud-based applications, enabling seamless integration between databases, identity management, and enterprise collaboration tools.
